start.text: Welcome to the High Seas! You are the captain of a pirate ship. What would you like to do?

treasure.text: You set sail in search of treasure. You find an island with a big 'X' on the sand. What do you do?

plunder.text: You find a merchant ship and prepare to board. They seem to have cannons. What's your move?

win.text: Congratulations, you found the treasure! You win!

lose1.text: You decided it was too risky. Unfortunately, you find nothing and lose.

lose2.text: You were outgunned and the merchant ship sank your pirate ship. You lose.
